verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H3068"\w* end, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w for|strong="H3045"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

Deliver \w me|strong="H0995"\w*, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* Lord, \w from|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* evil man: rescue \w me|strong="H0995"\w* \w from|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* unjust man.

\w Who|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* devised iniquities \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* hearts: \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* day long \w they|strong="H3605"\w* designed battles.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* sharpened \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w tongues|strong="H3956"\w* \w like|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* serpent: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* venom \w of|strong="H3068"\w* saps \w is|strong="H0369"\w* under \w their|strong="H3605"\w* lips.

Keep \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, O Lord, \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wicked: \w and|strong="H3709"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* unjust men deliver \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. Who \w have|strong="H5921"\w* proposed \w to|strong="H5921"\w* supplant \w my|strong="H5921"\w* steps.

\w The|strong="H4480"\w* proud \w have|strong="H3808"\w* hidden \w a|strong="H4480"\w* net \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*. \w And|strong="H1847"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* stretched \w out|strong="H4480"\w* cords \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* snare: \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* laid \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* stumblingblock \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* wayside.

I said \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord: Thou art \w my|strong="H6440"\w* God: hear, O Lord, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* voice \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* supplication.

\w O|strong="H0859"\w* Lord, Lord, \w the|strong="H0518"\w* strength \w of|strong="H8064"\w* \w my|strong="H0518"\w* salvation: thou hast overshadowed \w my|strong="H0518"\w* head \w in|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* day \w of|strong="H8064"\w* battle.

\w Give|strong="H5375"\w* me not \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, O Lord, \w from|strong="H5375"\w* \w my|strong="H5375"\w* \w desire|strong="H5375"\w* \w to|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* wicked: \w they|strong="H5375"\w* \w have|strong="H5375"\w* plotted against me; do not thou forsake me, lest \w they|strong="H5375"\w* should triumph.

\w The|strong="H1571"\w* head \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* compassing \w me|strong="H0270"\w* \w about|strong="H8033"\w*: \w the|strong="H1571"\w* labour \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H1571"\w* lips \w shall|strong="H1571"\w* \w overwhelm|strong="H0270"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w*.

Burning coals shall fall upon \w them|strong="H1157"\w*; thou wilt cast \w them|strong="H1157"\w* down \w into|strong="H3915"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* fire: \w in|strong="H0559"\w* miseries \w they|strong="H0559"\w* shall \w not|strong="H0216"\w* \w be|strong="H0389"\w* able \w to|strong="H0559"\w* stand.

\w A|strong="H4480"\w* man \w full|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* tongue \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w established|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* earth: evil \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* catch \w the|strong="H4480"\w* unjust man unto destruction.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* know \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H0990"\w* do justice \w to|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* needy, \w and|strong="H0990"\w* \w will|strong="H0990"\w* revenge \w the|strong="H3588"\w* poor.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* just, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w give|strong="H3034"\w* glory \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thy name: \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* upright \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* dwell \w with|strong="H5921"\w* thy countenance.
